description:
Souta returns home with Kikuno during summer break, and is spoiled by her. Ruri shows up all of a sudden and takes him away. He ends up at Akane`s house. Everyone from Quest Dorm is worried about him and shows up too, except Nanami...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ato kara Kanarazu Oitsuku. Ore ga Yakusoku o Yabutta Koto ga Atta ka?
I`ll Catch Up to You. Have I Ever Broken a Promise to You Before?
Promis, je vous rejoins. Est-ce que j’ai déjà rompu une promesse ?
سأتأكد من اللحاق بك، هل أخلفت وعدًا لي من قبل؟
後から必ず追いつく. 俺が約束を破ったことがあったか?
